resources.string: Welcome to the app \'Six Sense\' We invite you to listen to a brief instruction on how to work with the program..
Bluetooth or Bluetooth Low Energy is not supported on this device
Bluetooth is not supported on your device
Bluetooth LE is not supported on your device
The application needs access to the location
Please provide access to the location for the correct operation of the application

string-array.name: instruction_array
string-array.item: You are listening to the first message from 6. When you open the application, you get to the main menu, from here you can listen to this instruction, go to navigation or listen to information about developers.
You are listening to the second message from 6. For the first use of the system on any object, an Internet connection is required, for further use, a connection is optional.

You are listening to the third message from 6. If you open the navigation menu near an object equipped with our system, then within a few seconds your location will be automatically determined, as evidenced by the inscription on the first button on the screen, then you need to select a destination in the corresponding menu, the button to call it is located next to the button location selection. After selecting the destination, it remains to press the "find route" button and wait for voice prompts.
You are listening to the fourth message from 6. The app has a walk function, when you are in the route selection menu, the app will tell you your location.

You are listening to the fifth message out of 6. At the bottom of the screen there is an About us button where you can listen to information about developers, and if you hold the About Us button, you will enter the settings menu
You are listening to the sixth message from 6. To exit any menu, use the standard "back" button
